section.title: How the game is planned
section.p: The user may train word inflection in a systematic way. We use questions and sentences, so that the user also may learn in what context to use the wordforms, or learn to work with singleton words. The user may also consult a Norwegian translation of the words.

section.title: Parts of speech and inflection
section.p: The user may choose what part of speech to work with; noun, adjective, verb or numeral.

ul.li: Adjective: as attribute or predicative, and comparision
Verb: mode, tense, affirmative/negative form, number/person
Numeal: as attribute to noun in different cases, as collective numeral or as ordinal
eastern or western dialect (not implemented yet)
